data.persona: I am an explorer who travels the kingdom. I discover new lands and technologies that we do not have in our kingdom. I travel all over looking for the new lands to conquer.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
Cold and dark, the moist cool walls enclose all who proceed. With just torches to light the way the large opening gets smaller and smaller.
There's some dripping water, some bones, some passages, an opening, some walls, and some torches here.

You are carrying a compass and some fabric, wearing a full robe, made from really expensive material, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to get dripping water to a water bottle.
data.mid_motivation: I need some water to drink along the way.
data.long_motivation: I have a long journey ahead of me and need all necessary amenities.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use the compass with the torch.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the direction of the compass.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put the container on between the dripping water.
